title: Find a Provider
description: Search adult and pediatric providers and schedule appointments online. Taking care of your health is essential. Get your health care back on schedule with UPMC.
cleaned_text: - [Find a Doctor](/providers) - [Services](#) Find a UPMC health care facility close to you quickly by browsing by region.Frequently Searched Services - [Services by Region](#servicesbyregion) - Region](#locationsbyregion) - [Locations by Type](#locationsbytype) -
